name: Yuechen Zhang
aboutIntro: Hello, Welcome to my site. My name is Yuechen Zhang, and usually, people call me Joe.
aboutCurStat: I am currently an undergrad student from the University of Waterloo, pursuing my BCS Degree in Data Science. If everything happens as expected, I will be graduating in December 2022.
aboutExp: My academic program also comes with Coop requirements. Hence, I already have over 1 year of working experience. From coursework and internships, I gained lots of knowledge and experience in Computer Science, Statistics, Machine Learning, Database Management, and Software Engineering.
aboutSkill: Languages and Technologies I am proficient in include: C, C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, R, Python, TensorFlow, SQL, NoSQL, Git, etc. I will be demonstrating my knowledge in them in a later section.

detail: Working on a project that uses NLP Algorithms  on Regulatory Documents to help legislators and economists find regulations more efficiently, and assit them in making decisions.
Focusing on refactoring UI/UX, prototyping and developing new features, building RESTful APIs for features, detecting and fixing bugs, and building queries for extracting data.
Fortified experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Express, NPM, etc.
